mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO orderCenter (ORDER_ID,BOOK_ID,BOOK_NAME,NUM,PRICE,AMOUNT,CUSTOM_ID,CUSTOM,CUSTOM_MOBILE,SELLER_ID,SELLER,SELLER_MOBILE,CREATE_TIME,END_TIME,ORDER_STATE) VALUES
(#{item.ORDER_ID},#{item.BOOK_ID},#{item.BOOK_NAME},#{item.NUM},#{item.PRICE},#{item.AMOUNT},#{item.CUSTOM_ID},#{item.CUSTOM},#{item.CUSTOM_MOBILE},#{item.SELLER_ID},#{item.SELLER},#{item.SELLER_MOBILE},#{item.CREATE_TIME},#{item.END_TIME},#{item.ORDER_STATE})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE ORDER_STATE=VALUES (ORDER_STATE)
